The way to share I'd recommend is to always open a scope and specify reuse parameter.
It should work fine with everything, there is no need to un-reuse at all.

with tf.variable_scope("my_model"):
   outputs = tf.layers....(inputs)
# some other code
with tf.variable_scope("my_model", reuse=True):
     outputs = tf.layers....(inputs)

body:
The way to share I'd recommend is to always open a scope and specify reuse parameter.
It should work fine with everything, there is no need to un-reuse at all.

```
with tf.variable_scope("my_model"):
   outputs = tf.layers....(inputs)
# some other code
with tf.variable_scope("my_model", reuse=True):
     outputs = tf.layers....(inputs)
```
